Unknown Risks Complex AI systems contain layered security risks based on the tools and data you connect that are difficult to spot. Compromised Agents AI systems and Agents are one bad input away from a security incident. No Visibility Current tooling does not provide the visibility to detect or respond to the new attack surface of AI applications, agents, and MCP servers. About Us With AI, your old defenses fall short. With AI, your old defences fall short. C o n t a c t u s f o r m o r e i n f o r m a t i o n Our Team Meet the team A I r i s k s a r e a n e w p a r a d i g m . Y o u n e e d l e a d e r s w h o c a n l o o k a r o u n d t h e c o r n e r . O u r f o u n d e r s h a v e l e d i n v e s t i g a t i o n s i n t o n a t i o n - s t a t e t h r e a t s a n d a u t o m a t e d d e f e n s e s f o r F o r t u n e 1 0 0 c o m p a n i e s . A I a g e n t s , a u t o n o m o u s t h r e a t s , a n d t h e o p e r a t i o n a l r i s k . Jason Rebholz Co-Founder &amp; CEO Jason is a seasoned security executive focused on emerging risks. After a decade responding to sophisticated nation-state cyber attacks and destructive ransomware, Jason spent four years as the CISO of a series C insurtech, leading internal security, threat intelligence, and services. His unique experience brings a practical approach to emerging agentic risk. Jason Rebholz Co-Founder &amp; CEO Jason is a seasoned cybersecurity executive passionate about simplifying cybersecurity. After a decade responding to sophisticated cyber attacks, Jason spent four years as the CISO of series C insurtech leading internal security, threat intelligence, and services. Jason Rebholz Co-Founder &amp; CEO Jason is a seasoned security executive focused on emerging risks. After a decade responding to sophisticated nation-state cyber attacks and destructive ransomware, Jason spent four years as the CISO of a series C insurtech, leading internal security, threat intelligence, and services. His unique experience brings a practical approach to emerging agentic risk. Jeff Chan Co-Founder &amp; CTO Jeff is a proven technology leader who has driven transformative initiatives in security and product development. His incident response and threat intelligence experience allowed him to automate security monitoring and defenses for a Fortune 100 company. Jeff spent four years as the CTO of an incident response company, where he built an innovative incident response and data platform. Jeff Chan Co-Founder &amp; CTO Jeff is a technology leader known for driving innovation and spearheading transformative initiatives in cybersecurity, IT infrastructure, and product development. He is recognized for his expertise in incident response, threat intelligence, and technology transformation.
